prokimenon: My soul magnifies the Lord, and my spirit has rejoiced in God my Saviour.
Because he has regarded the humility of His handmaid; for behold, all generations shall call me blessed.
alleluia: Hear, O daughter, and see, and incline your ear.
The rich among the people shall entreat your countenance.
communion: I will take the cup of salvation;* and I will call upon the name of the Lord.
